ygData.subject: Re: R: [EQ_Necromancer] Level 4 and 8 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: i would put ward undead right up there with the pet spell.  it does 36 damage to undead at lvl 8.  personally, if you want to travel, i would get gather
ygData.messageBody:
i would put ward undead right up there with the pet spell. it does 36
damage to undead at lvl 8. personally, if you want to travel, i would get
gather darkness soon too. i would wait until L9 to get dark pact, but it is
a definite must have. why would i wait? you get more hp at L9, so it is
not as dangerous to use the spell.

belphenor

>From: "Liet" <arrakis@...>
>
>Hmm the weakest one since when they cast it on you it doesnt take out much
>hp
>At level 8 I would get the spells in this order :
>Bone walk , mend bones , gather shadows , dark empathy , lesser shielding .
>Someone told me Dark pact is good too but I havent checked it yet
>

> >> From: Andy <skimaster@...>

> >> Right now, I am a level 5 Necromancer. I have bought Cavorting Bones(I
> >think that is the name of the level 4 pet spell), Clinging Darkness, and
> >Lifespike. Are tehre any other spells I should buy at this level. I am
>not
> >going to buy Gate until level 8, because I will not be travelling far
>until
> >level 8(when I get Gather Shadows). At level 8, what spells should I buy?
> >Right now, I am thinking Gather Shadows -> Pet -> Gate -> Ward Undead.
>Are
> >there any other spells I should buy at this level? And should I change
>this
> >order?
